attributes.action: Get official clarification to keep Vape Shops open during COVID19 lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Specialist e-cigarette/vape shops are an essential part of life in 2020 UK... 
Millions of people around the UK need to get there e-cig supplies to ensure they do relapse and start smoking again, a supermarket, gas station or corner shop does no sell all the flavors or coils people can need, but does sell all the tobbaco anyone could want.
Also to not undo all the hard work that has been done through government, NHS, and PHE'S guidence to stop smoking and start using e-cigarettes.
attributes.background:
Keep Vape Shops Open..

The industry has been given no deffinate guidence on opening during the COVID-19 lockdown... 

Can we remain open with a one in one out policy?
